actors.name: Contract Owner
actors.summary: The owner of the contracts, responsible for setting parameters, minting/burning tokens, and managing rewards.

actions.name: Set Stable Base CDP Address
actions.summary: The owner sets the address for the stable base CDP, linking the token to its stability mechanism.

actions.name: Mint DFID Tokens
actions.summary: The owner or authorized minters create new DFID tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFID Tokens
actions.summary: The owner or authorized accounts destroy DFID tokens.

actions.name: Set Stability Pool Address
actions.summary: The owner sets the address of the stability pool.

actions.name: Mint DFIRE Tokens
actions.summary: The owner or authorized minters create new DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFIRE Tokens
actions.summary: The owner or authorized accounts destroy DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Set Addresses
actions.summary: The owner sets the addresses for the staking token, reward token, and stable base contract.

actions.name: Add Reward
actions.summary: The owner adds rewards to the contract for distribution to stakers.

actions.name: Add Collateral Reward
actions.summary: The owner adds collateral rewards to the contract for distribution to stakers.

actions.name: Set Addresses
actions.summary: Sets addresses of various contracts used by StableBase.

actions.name: Set Can Stability Pool Receive Rewards
actions.summary: Sets whether the stability pool can receive rewards.

actions.name: Set Can SBR Staking Pool Receive Rewards
actions.summary: Sets whether the SBR staking pool can receive rewards.

actions.name: Set Addresses
actions.summary: Sets the addresses for the staking token, stable base CDP, and SBR token.

actions.name: Add Reward
actions.summary: Adds rewards to the contract.

actions.name: Add Collateral Reward
actions.summary: Adds collateral rewards to the contract.

actions.name: Set Price
actions.summary: Allows the owner to set the price. Used only for testing purposes.

actions.name: Set Addresses
actions.summary: Sets the address of the stable base CDP contract.

actors.name: Users/Stakers/Borrowers
actors.summary: Users who stake tokens, borrow DFID, and manage their CDPs.

actions.name: Stake
actions.summary: Users stake the staking token to earn rewards.

actions.name: Unstake
actions.summary: Users unstake their tokens.

actions.name: Claim
actions.summary: Users claim their accumulated rewards.

actions.name: Stake
actions.summary: Users stake tokens in the stability pool to earn rewards and participate in liquidations.

actions.name: Unstake
actions.summary: Users unstake tokens from the stability pool.

actions.name: Claim
actions.summary: Users claim rewards from the stability pool.

actions.name: Open Safe
actions.summary: Opens a new CDP.

actions.name: Close Safe
actions.summary: Closes an existing CDP.

actions.name: Borrow
actions.summary: Borrows debt against collateral in a CDP.

actions.name: Repay
actions.summary: Repays debt for a CDP.

actions.name: Add Collateral
actions.summary: Adds collateral to a CDP.

actions.name: Withdraw Collateral
actions.summary: Withdraws collateral from a CDP.

actions.name: Redeem
actions.summary: Redeems debt.

actions.name: Fee Topup
actions.summary: Tops up the fee for a CDP.

actions.name: Adjust Position
actions.summary: Adjusts the position of a CDP.

actors.name: Liquidators
actors.summary: Actors who monitor CDPs and initiate liquidations when they are undercollateralized.

actions.name: Liquidate Safe
actions.summary: Liquidates a specific CDP.

actions.name: Perform Liquidation
actions.summary: Performs a liquidation for a given amount and collateral.

actions.name: Liquidate
actions.summary: Initiates liquidation.

actors.name: Price Oracle
actors.summary: Provides price data to the protocol.

actions.name: Fetch Price
actions.summary: Fetches the latest price from the Chainlink price feed.
